name: Galaxy Guardian Asteroids Wars
description:
Are You ready to defend galaxy from aliens spaceships invasion, and save the planet ?
Show Your skills in space shooting game and be best space hero !

features:
Lots of spaceships to unlock
Easy controls use left and right buttons to rotate Your spaceship
Use finger to move Your starship all over the screen
Great fast paced electro music
Challenging gameplay

Attributions:
music
FoxSynergy
